Title: Papillon
Writer: Aaron Guzikowski (screenplay by), Henri Charri√®re (based upon the books "Papillon" and "Banco" by), Dalton Trumbo (based upon the 1973 screenplay "Papillon" by), Lorenzo Semple Jr. (based upon the 1973 screenplay "Papillon" by)
Actors: Charlie Hunnam, Damijan Oklopdzic, Christopher Fairbank, Jason Ryan
Plot: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.
